title: Violinist Fiora - Lets Introduce Violins To League Shall We?
body:
http://fc07.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2014/010/0/b/_sketch__violinist_fiora_by_vanchamarl-d71mtut.png

Artist: http://vanchamarl.deviantart.com/

This skin is the most brightest Idea a person can make, Enough with Arcade, Pool party, Lunar Festival, Mafia skins, blood moon, etc etc FOR NOW. Lets have something different!

Remember guys, Fiora doesn't have her own special recall or any special effects within all her skins so why not release something this year for Fiora that's special and worth the price shall we? (;

What To Expect?

* Custom Recall - Fiora plays the violin, With baron she plays the tune of the violin 2x faster.

* Custom Dance - Fiora plays the violin while dancing around.

* Custom Taunts/Jokes

* Custom SFX

What Would Be Nice To Have On This Skin?

You guys decide and it will be mention within this thread below this question! (:

**Needs to be playing the violin during her ult in mid air then its perfect. - viva le me**

**Omg! her ult would be like.. she's playing her violin here and there!!! omg! with different poses!!! omg i love this idea. - Asul
**

**On Fiora's movement phrase's she could ask the summoner what kind of melody they would like to hear. Special interaction with Sona's default skin that when both champion's use the dance command they play a melody together.- What Is Smite**

**Dance inspired by Lindsey Stirling's moves, yes please. -Silven**

**The autoattacks can make different pitches of notes and the crits could be high notes, similar to her headmistress skin. -Biopanda** 

**She needs to play Bond songs and some classics like Requiem and Moonlight Sonata. That would be awesome. Requiem on ult. XD Would throw money at Riot for that every 2 minutes. - RustyMuFFins**

Dance inspired by Lindsey Stirling's moves, yes please.

As a violinist, I flinch at the thought of using the bow as a weapon but I think it would be a cool idea non the less.
She already uses a ruler in her only 975 skin so why not a bow lol
It's delicate and expensive, unlike a ruler

> http://img1.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20080911203455/capcomdatabase/images/7/78/JusticeYurika.png

Off topic question: I've never seen you here before! :O And you're a web engineer so I have a question...  Is learning how to do coding hard? xD
Learning to write code takes some work but I think anyone can do it if they put in the time. There are a lot of great resources like [Code Academy](http://www.codecademy.com/) online for free too!
I find there are two types of people - those than can code and those that can't. People who can't code can't learn it no matter how much time they spend or how much help they get to teach them.
I disagree. Learning the fundamentals can be hard, but it takes both effort from the student and the right teacher. With both, I think anyone can do it.

> [{quoted}](name=Bear Hat Alice,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bP7Auw76,comment-id=00200000000000010000,timestamp=2015-01-27T17:53:22.238+0000)
>
> I disagree. Learning the fundamentals can be hard, but it takes both effort from the student and the right teacher. With both, I think anyone can do it.

Is true that there's a lot of math involved with coding? :( IM TERRIBLE at math.

Not necessarily! You do need math to learn a lot of the stuff you would be taught in a Computer Science program (for things like algorithms) but none of it is advanced math (calculus) until you get into some of the heavier stuff. For the kind of programming I do (frontend web, services) we do not need that much math at all.

> [{quoted}](name=Bear Hat Alice,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=bP7Auw76,comment-id=0020000000000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T03:13:50.360+0000)
>
> Not necessarily! You do need math to learn a lot of the stuff you would be taught in a Computer Science program (for things like algorithms) but none of it is advanced math (calculus) until you get into some of the heavier stuff. For the kind of programming I do (frontend web, services) we do not need that much math at all.

At first you said " you do need math to learn a lot of stuff " then you said " we do not need that much math at all" .

wat

What I mean is, if you go to a four-year Computer Science program you will encounter some classes that require math. Certainly not everything, but some. That said, a lot of the stuff I learned in those classes are not applied in my day-to-day job.
Lindsey Stirling Fiora????

Even tho Fiora got a re-work I'm pretty sure Riot can still create some pretty crazy stuff for this skin. I'd honestly be surprised if this were to be her ultimate skin this year. Most people are eyeing Zyra or swain for an ultimate skin this year so dropping a Fiora skin would be a jaw dropper.
